ComicInfo.Summary: NVRLND is a dark and magical re-imagining of PETER PAN set in the present-day landscape of Hollywood. Wallflower turned wild-child Wendy Darling befriends the fiery Tiger Lily and falls into the music rave scene of the underground club NVRLND. Intoxicated by the music Wendy falls for the enigmatic Peter, lead singer of the band The Lost Boys. Peter is everything a girl could desire: Handsome, daring and reckless. Wendy discovers that Peter is mixed up with the mysterious tattoo artist James Hook, who preys upon the young who flock to Peter, "hooking" them on the new designer drug, Pixie Dust. You think you may know the truth about NVRLND but the truth is you know nothing. NVRLND is a story for anyone who never wants to grow up...but may not live long enough to have a choice.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-21 13:58:34. [CVDB543903]
ComicInfo.Characters: Captain Hook, Peter Pan, Tiger Lily, Wendy Darling
